review: We visited Doctor Smitha R on the day i have got the confirmed positive sign for pregnancy. We must say that the doctor has taken well care starting from day1. She was always friendly and very patience in explaining the pregnancy progress and helped us to take the next step properly.  We surely recommend her at every aspect.

review: Very nice doctor, good in explanation , identifies the problem n treats accordingly and being approachable at the same time. We get that confidence that we are in safe hands. I give a 5 Star *****
